action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage and the Draugr can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target is thrown up to 10 feet away and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) and be knocked {@condition prone}
The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and the Draugr can make a bite attack against the target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Assimilated Vessel
entries: When the Draugr Amalgamation dies, it spawns a {@creature Wrathful Spirit} that uses the same initiative count.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) slashing damage and the Draugr can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target is thrown up to 20 feet away and must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) and be knocked {@condition prone}
The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and the Draugr can make a bite attack against the target.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d4 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Breath of Cartilage (Charge 1)
entries: The draugr exhales a forceful breath of bone shards and teeth in a 30 foot cone. Creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} dexterity save or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success.

legendary.name: Slash
entries: The Draugr makes one slash attack

legendary.name: Writhing Bones (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: All creatures within 10 feet of the Draugr must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity save or take 14 ({@damage 3d8}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Insanity
entries: Walter has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Walter makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gravekeeper makes one attack with his sickle and one with his shovel.

action.name: sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} con save or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute.

action.name: Shovel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Con save or be {@condition stunned} until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Incorporeal Form
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
Any creature the spirit moves through takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Anguish
entries: The spirit forces a creature within 30 feet of it to succeed on a {@dc 15} wisdom save, on a failure the creature takes ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} the creature takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage at the start of each of their turns. The creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Surge of Shades
entries: All creatures within 20 feet of the spirit must succeed on a {@dc 15} dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Shift
entries: The spirit moves up to half its movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Wrath
entries: The spirit forces a creature within 30 feet of it to succeed on a {@dc 15} wisdom save, on a failure the creature uses its reaction to make a weapon attack against a creature within range of the spirits choice.

legendary.name: Drain Vigor
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the spirit must succeed on a dc 15 constitution save, on a failure the creature takes 5d8 necrotic damage and it's maximum health is reduced for an amount equal to half the damage dealt. On a success the creatures takes half damage and it's health total is not reduced.

legendary.name: Surge of Shades (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Spirit uses its Surge of Shades.
